# flat-tree

[![crates.io version][1]][2] [![build status][3]][4]
[![downloads][5]][6] [![docs.rs docs][7]][8]

Map a binary tree to a list. Adapted from
[mafintosh/flat-tree](https://github.com/mafintosh/flat-tree).

- [Documentation][8]
- [Crates.io][2]
